From @WSJopinion: The federal government gives more cash to state and local governments than it spends on its own defense. These are the priorities of a peacetime welfare state, not a nation serious about defending itself in a world of enemies. https://t.co/ULQmi9LzoE

‚Äî The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 13, 2024
